/opt/crc/c/cuda/10.0/bin/nvcc   -g -G  -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/bend-model.dir/main.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/bend-model.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/opt/crc/c/cuda/10.0/lib64/stubs  -L/opt/crc/c/cuda/10.0/lib64 libsystemLib.a libpugixmlLib.a src_bucket_scheme/libbucket_schemeLib.a src_fibrin/libfibrinLib.a src_plt/libpltLib.a libstorageLib.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
